item.title: Reading Strings And Integers At Specified Coords?
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Is there a way to do this? I want to make a cheat for www.worldmathsday.com
I was messing around with Marting google wars this is what i got :

[code]Program googleFight;
const
s2 = ‘a’;
Var
G2, G2A, No1, No2 : string;
PosNo1, PosNo2, Answer : Integer;
Time : Integer;
OverallTime : Integer;
procedure getGoogle;
var
ResultPage : String; x : integer;
begin
Time := GetTickCount;
ResultPage := GetPage(‘http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=+’ + s2);
ResultPage := Between(‘Results ‘, ‘of about’, ResultPage);
Repeat
x:= Pos(’,’,ResultPage);
Delete(ResultPage,x,1);
until(x=0);
G2:= ResultPage;
G2 := Replace(G2, ‘’, ‘’)
G2 := Replace(G2, ‘’, ‘’)
G2A := GetOthers(G2)
G2A:= Trim(G2A)
if G2A = ‘-’ then
begin
PosNo1 := Pos(‘10’, G2);
PosNo2 := Pos(‘1’, G2);
No1 := Copy(G2, PosNo1, PosNo1)
No2 := Copy(G2, PosNo2, PosNo2)
No1 := Trim(No1)
No2 := Trim(No2)
Answer := StrToInt(No1) - StrToInt(No2)
Writeln(IntToStr(Answer))
end;
OverallTime := GetTickCount - Time;
Writeln(‘It took about ’ + IntToStr(OverallTime) + ’ milliseconds to get the answer’)
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
getGoogle;
TerminateScript;
end.[/code]
That would work but the adress for the game is always random and this uses a between function whereas the sum isnt between anything.
any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Reading Strings And Integers At Specified Coords?
